DOC.brief_summary: The purpose protocol evaluate efficacy safety Dysport® use 2 mL dilution compare placebo treatment Cervical Dystonia .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety DYSPORT® Using 2mL Dilution Adults With Cervical Dystonia .
DOC.criteria: Primary diagnosis Cervical Dystonia least 9 month since onset either previously untreated botulinum toxin currently treat Botox total dosing range 100200 U ≤60 U sternocleidomastoid muscle last injection cycle , satisfactory treatment response principal investigator 's judgment last two sequential Botox treatment cycle . TWSTRS total score≥ 20 ; TWSTRSseverity subscale score > 10 ; In apparent remission Cervical Dystonia Diagnosis pure retrocollis pure anterocollis For nonnaïve subject , previous poor response either last two Botox treatment Known requirement < 100U > 200U Botox inject neck muscle
